remarks: Extend class notation with a map from each nonzero vector ` x ` to a unique nonzero functional in the closed kernel dual space.  (We could extend it to include the zero vector, but that is unnecessary for our purposes.)  TODO:  This pattern is used several times earlier e.g. ~ lcf1o , ~ dochfl1 - should we update those to use this definition? (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2015.)
